item.title: FT Most Read: Monday, April 15, 2024 at 7:40 PM UTC
item.description:
1. ‘We’re crazier than you realise’: Iran delivers its message with attack on Israel
2. The night Iran’s missile spectacle rattled Israel
3. Biden urges restraint from Israel after Iran’s drone and missile attack
4. US and Europe seek to dissuade Israel from striking back against Iran
5. Should governments tax the great boomer wealth transfer?
item.guid: FT Most Read: Monday, April 15, 2024 at 7:40 PM UTC
